H0.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Belgians

H1.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Francophones

H2.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Belgae

H3.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Walons

A4.text: Walloons are a Gallo-Romance ethnic group native to Wallonia, Belgium.

A5.text: The Walloon language, widespread in use up until the Second World War, has been dying out of common use due in part to its prohibition by the public school system, in favor of French.
